services: Engine oil change and filter replacement.
Tire inspection, pressure check, rotation, and balancing.
Air filter and cabin filter replacement.
Fluid top-ups (coolant, brake fluid, power steering, windshield wash).
Engine tune-up and spark plug replacement.
AC system inspection and gas refill.
website_usage: To use the chatbot, simply type your question in the chat window and press Enter.
For assistance at any time, click the help icon or type 'help' in the chat.
You can ask about our automobile services, pricing, appointment booking, or technical support.
Browse through the service categories to learn more about what we offer.
Use the appointment form to schedule a vehicle service at your preferred date and time.
Check your appointment status through the chatbot or the dashboard.
Navigate through the menu to access service types, customer details, and reports.
If you experience any issues, contact support through the chatbot or the support page.
